channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report E-2025060195
item.description:
Report E-2025060195

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-22
  • City: LATTA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PETROLEUM TRANSPORT COMPANY, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 357671
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Driver failed to slow for traffic and lost control of tanker unit resulting in rollover and product spill. Spill was caused by punctures in the wall of the tanker trailer. Duration of the release was approximately 3 hours due to Driver being transported by EMS for suspected injury. FD and envorimnental cleanup crew responded to contain and stop releasae.
